snippet: Rick Santorum is banking on South Carolina to regain the momentum he had a week ago, when he nearly won the Iowa caucuses.
abstract: Rick Santorum is banking on South Carolina to regain the momentum he had a week ago, when he nearly won the Iowa caucuses.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- After his disappointing showing Tuesday in the New Hampshire primary, Rick Santorum is banking on South Carolina to regain the momentum he had a week ago, when he nearly won the Iowa caucuses.
